titles: A dialogue betwixt Lewis and the devil in the last year of his puissance: with his last will and testament
publisher: printed by John Wallis, near the Green Dragon Tavern in Fleet-street,
notes: Date of publication from Wing (CD-ROM edition).
In verse: "What shrill and eccho'd groans possess my soul?"
Lewis = Louis XIV, King of France.
Reproduction of original in the Newberry Library.
keywords: Louis --  XIV, --  King of France, 1638-1715 --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
